Name: Get Together
Description: A network building application for my IT friends with features of polishing user main profile by adding projects, experiences, skills, and educations.
MainFeature: Featured real-time messages, live-status and follow/unfollow.
FrontEnd: Angular 14, Heroku, Git, PostgreSQL, ASP.NET, Bootstrap 5, SignalR, WebSocket

Name: Bulletin Board
Description: An Instagram-like web-base application with features of view, comment, like, and posts.
MainFeature: View, Comment, Sub comments, Tag, Like, and Posts Google and Facebook login
FrontEnd: Angular, Firebase , Git, NgRx , RxJS , TypeScriptSkills

Name: MINESWEEPER
Description: A mini game focusing a variety of JavaScript Events using Vue.js
MainFeature: Find mines with mouse events, checking blocks, marking mines, finding all blocks surrounded
